channel.title: Need help with a few things
channel.description:
- My first problem is, NPCs and monsters. They don't die, like they have unlimited HP. Some die though, but I guess only when they want to (emo?) They reach 0 health, then it jumps up higher than the original HP like 241/184 or something. Plus, they hit higher than normal as well. If am at lvl 235 combat and a lvl 85 Kalphite thingy hits me with a 35, then I know I need to fix something ^^
-2nd problem, Magic. None of my spells do ANY damage at all, normal or Ancient. All I can do is teleport. From what I understand, you don't need runes to cast these spells. I've tried with and without runes and still nothing. I can't even kill a level 1 rat!
I'm pretty sure there's something I can add/edit to change these, but I know nothing of coding. Please help.
PS. the emo thing was a JOKE!!

item.title: Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @dragonkid575 dragonkid575
item.source: Need help with a few things

item.title: Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

This is what i have for my barrage and it works like a charm.

if(magicID == 12891) //ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(6529, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(6529, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(6529, getItemSlot(6529), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a few things

item.title: Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @dragonkid575 dragonkid575
item.description:
@dragonkid575 wrote:

here’s what my ice barrage looks like

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] > 124) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 40 "+getItemName(560)+", 40 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 60 "+getItemName(554)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(39); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(370, 39, 10); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

[quote=“Deviation Scape, post:4, topic:108205”]lol

I figured someone else was trying to post this at the same time.[/quote]

yea tis pretty common that youll get beat to the punch =] and btw dragon these are what my barrage look like so you can look through it see if theres any differences in them

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= -124 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true)) { deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); startAnimation(1979); attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0); //hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(67); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); //stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] > 124) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 40 "+getItemName(560)+", 40 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 60 "+getItemName(554)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(39); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(370, 39, 10); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

hope these might help ya

Read full topic
